caption.p: ( a) Inhibitory Concentration (IC 50 in μg mL −1; upper panel) and ( b) Minimum Bactericidal Concentration (MBC in μg mL −1; lower panel) for the top-10 most effective blends of essential oils against the fish pathogen Aeromonas veronii bv. sobria. The exact composition of the seven essential oils in each blend is shown in Table S2.
